name: Ski Resort: Idle Snow Tycoon
description:
Have you ever dreamed of owning your own ski resort? Now you can make your dreams come true!

Build your own ski empire, make billions and have fun! Use many idle clicker mechanics and become a ski tycoon.

Features:
- Many different buildings to build - bar, restaurant, rental, school and more!
- Play in AR Mode!
- Enjoy beautiful graphics
- Upgrade businesses
- Manage your ski park so everything works optimally
- Get hundreds of customers to play and earn you money
- Collect gold and grow your business!
- Invite VIP customers to fly to your ski resort
- Intuitive gameplay with clicker mechanics!
- Offline game - no internet connection needed!
